summary: This module is a test suite for the safe string manipulation functions (strl*) in the Sendmail library, including sm_strlcpy, sm_strlcat, sm_strlcat2, and sm_strlcpyn. It verifies that these functions correctly handle string concatenation, copying, length limits, and return the expected values.

logs.reason: Identifies the version of the test file within the Sendmail codebase
Indicates the start of the test suite for the strl* string functions
Reports the pass/fail status of individual tests comparing expected and actual results of string operations
logs.resolution: If tests are failing, investigate the specific string function implementation or test case expectations
